page.title: 15BREAK DANCING HITS LAINDON
page.content: This new craze is expertly performed by young people in our area. Break dancing is spinning on your back and spinning on your knees. Some of the movements are{scorpion, {caterpillar and windmill.} {Scorpion} To do a scorpion you put all your weight on your hands and put your legs in the air. {Windmill To do a windmill you lay on your back and twist your legs in the air while spinning. {Caterpillar To do a caterpillar you lay on the ground on your stomach and then pick your legs up and then your middle. Then you put your toes down and then your legs so that you make a sort of wave.
